meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of a complex sulfide of copper and iron.
meanings.sent1: Miners found shiny tetrahedrites in the deep cave.
meanings.sent2: Geologists study tetrahedrites to understand their composition.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gnome used tetrahedrites to play a prank on his friends.
meanings.sent4: The tetrahedrites sparkled like hidden treasures in the rock.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a large specimen of tetrahedrites for visitors to admire.
